tags.name: zui-custom-style
tags.description:
Internet Explorer 11 does not support CSS custom properties aka CSS variables natively, `<zui-custom-style>` attempts to support them in IE11 by parsing CSS that is passed into `<zui-custom-style>`, and converting the values assigned to the custom properties to hard coded values, therefore they lose their dynamic variable nature unless the styles are reloaded.

zui-custom-style is based on ShadyCSS a web component library tries to support some legacy browsers that do not support web components and their required features.

tags.name: zui-custom-stylesheet
tags.description:
Internet Explorer 11 does not support CSS custom properties aka CSS variables natively, `<zui-custom-stylesheet>` attempts to support them in IE11 by parsing CSS that is linked via `<zui-custom-stylesheet>`'s `href` attribute, and converting the values assigned to the custom properties to hard coded values, therefore they lose their dynamic variable nature unless the styles are reloaded.

zui-custom-style is based on ShadyCSS a web component library tries to support some legacy browsers that do not support web components and their required features.
